attributes.action: Respond to the petitions on this site in a reasonable manner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The responses to petitions on this site have ignored the content of the petition, given unrelated statistics and opinions and then dismissed the petition based on unrelated materials. e.g. stopop.

There is no point in this site and more importantly no real democracy if the wishes of the people are ignored and their questions avoided.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
